windowsPrograms.name: Google Chrome
windowsPrograms.fullDesc: Google Chrome is a cross-platform web browser developed by Google. It is the most popular web browser in the world, known for its speed, simplicity, and security.

windowsPrograms.name: FastStone Capture
windowsPrograms.shortDesc: A lightweight and easy-to-use screen capture and video recording tool that allows you to take high-quality screenshots and edit them quickly.
windowsPrograms.fullDesc:
FastStone Capture is a powerful and comprehensive screen capture and video recording tool known for its small size and fast performance. It enables users to capture any part of the screen, including windows, menus, specific regions, or the full screen. The program includes a built-in editor for adding text, arrows, highlights, watermarks, and visual effects.
It also supports video recording with audio from the microphone or system, making it ideal for tutorials, presentations, and gameplay recording.
features: Multiple capture modes (full screen, window, region, etc.)
Built-in image editor with annotation tools
Save images in multiple formats (PNG, JPEG, BMP, GIF, etc.)
Add arrows, text, shapes, and watermarks easily
Direct export to email, Word, or Excel
windowsPrograms.requirements:
Operating System: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11

Processor: Pentium IV or higher

RAM: 1 GB or more

Storage: At least 10 MB of free space

windowsPrograms.name: WinRAR AIO
windowsPrograms.shortDesc: WinRAR AIO is a powerful all-in-one file compression and extraction tool that supports all popular archive formats, offering high performance and ease of use.
windowsPrograms.fullDesc:
WinRAR AIO is the complete edition of WinRAR, combining all versions and tools into one comprehensive package. It is used to compress files to reduce their size and make them easier to share, as well as to extract all types of archives such as RAR, ZIP, ISO, 7Z, and more.
The program features a simple user interface that supports Arabic and many other languages, drag-and-drop functionality, and strong encryption for file protection.
WinRAR AIO stands out as one of the best file management tools due to its stability, speed, and efficiency in handling large files.
features: Full support for all major compression formats.
High speed in extracting and creating archives.
Ability to split large files into multiple parts.
Password protection and encryption for security.
windowsPrograms.requirements:
Operating System: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11

Processor: Intel or AMD, 1 GHz or higher

RAM: Minimum 512 MB

Free Disk Space: At least 20 MB

windowsPrograms.name: SSVID Helper
windowsPrograms.shortDesc: Quickly send the current page or video link to SSVID for further actions. A simple helper tool to open SSVID.net with one click.
windowsPrograms.fullDesc:
Quickly send the current page or video link to SSVID for further actions. A simple helper tool to open SSVID.net with one click.

SSVID Helper is a simple browser extension that helps you quickly send the current page or link to SSVID.net.
features: One-click button on supported sites to open SSVID.net
Right-click menu to open any link or media directly in SSVID
Lightweight and privacy-friendly: no tracking, no ads, no hidden code

windowsPrograms.name: Remote Mouse
windowsPrograms.shortDesc: Remote Mouse allows you to control your computer wirelessly using your smartphone or tablet as a mouse, keyboard, and touchpad.
windowsPrograms.fullDesc: Remote Mouse is a powerful and easy-to-use application that transforms your mobile device into a wireless mouse and keyboard for your computer. It connects your phone and computer through Wi-Fi or a local network, enabling you to move the cursor, type text, and control your system effortlessly. The app supports multi-touch gestures, customizable control panels, and quick access to system functions like volume control and media playback. It’s ideal for presentations, home entertainment, and remote desktop management. With its modern interface and smooth performance, Remote Mouse provides a convenient way to interact with your computer from anywhere within your network.
features: Turn your phone into a wireless mouse and keyboard
Smooth cursor movement and gesture support
Works with Windows, macOS, and Linux
windowsPrograms.requirements:
Android or iOS device

Windows, macOS, or Linux computer

Wi-Fi connection shared between devices

Remote Mouse desktop software installed on the computer

Minimum 1 GB RAM on the mobile device

windowsPrograms.name: IObit Driver Booster silent
windowsPrograms.shortDesc: IObit Driver Booster Silent is an automatic driver updater that installs and updates system drivers silently without user intervention.
windowsPrograms.fullDesc: IObit Driver Booster Silent is a powerful tool designed to automatically detect, download, and install outdated or missing drivers on your computer. The “Silent” version works quietly in the background, updating your drivers without showing installation dialogs or requiring user interaction. It helps improve system performance, enhance gaming experience, and ensure hardware stability by keeping all drivers up to date.
features: Silent installation and automatic driver updates.
Improves gaming performance and system stability.
Automatically backs up old drivers before updates.
windowsPrograms.requirements:
Operating System: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11

Processor: 1 GHz or faster

RAM: 1 GB minimum

Disk Space: 100 MB free space

androidApps.name: GearUP Booster
androidApps.shortDesc: GearUP Booster is a powerful mobile gaming optimizer designed to reduce lag, improve ping, and ensure smoother gameplay across online games.
androidApps.fullDesc: GearUP Booster is an advanced network optimization tool made specifically for gamers. It enhances your gaming experience by stabilizing your connection, reducing latency, and optimizing network routes between your device and game servers. With just one tap, you can boost performance for popular online games, ensuring smoother gameplay and faster response times. The app also provides detailed connection stats, intelligent routing technology, and a clean interface that makes it easy for all users to enjoy stable and fast gaming sessions.
features: Smart routing technology for stable connections
Works on Wi-Fi and mobile networks
androidApps.requirements:
Android 6.0 or later

Minimum 2 GB RAM

Stable internet connection

androidApps.name: Netflix
androidApps.shortDesc: Netflix is a leading streaming platform that lets you watch movies, TV shows, documentaries, and exclusive originals anytime and anywhere.
androidApps.fullDesc: Netflix APK gives you instant access to a vast library of entertainment, including movies, TV series, anime, and exclusive Netflix Originals. You can stream content in HD, download your favorite titles for offline viewing, and personalize your experience with multiple user profiles. Netflix constantly updates its catalog with new releases across all genres — from drama and action to comedy and horror — ensuring there’s something for everyone. With adaptive streaming technology, Netflix adjusts video quality based on your internet speed for smooth and uninterrupted playback.
features: Watch movies, TV shows, and Netflix Originals
Support for HD and 4K playback (on supported devices)
androidApps.requirements:
Android 7.0 or later

Stable internet connection (minimum 5 Mbps for HD streaming)

Sufficient storage space for downloads

androidApps.name: MT Manager
androidApps.shortDesc: MT Manager is a powerful file manager and APK editor for Android that lets you manage files, modify apps, and explore system data efficiently.
androidApps.fullDesc: MT Manager APK is a multifunctional Android tool combining a file manager and APK editor in one application. It allows users to browse, copy, move, and organize files easily while offering advanced options for editing APK files directly on the device. With MT Manager, you can decompile, translate, and recompile APKs, edit XML and text files, and modify app resources. It also supports ZIP/RAR compression, root access functions, and dual-panel file management for faster navigation. MT Manager is ideal for developers, translators, and advanced users who need a professional tool for app modification and system-level file operations.
features: Full-featured file manager with dual-panel view
Edit, decompile, and recompile APK files
Root access for system file editing (optional)
Batch file operations and search tools
Supports file encryption and permissions editing
androidApps.requirements:
Android 6.0 or later

Recommended 2 GB RAM or higher

Root access for advanced functions (optional)

100 MB free storage space

androidApps.name: Zarchive pro
androidApps.shortDesc: A powerful archive manager and extractor on Android allowing you to compress, decompress, view and edit archive files in many formats.
androidApps.fullDesc: ZArchiver Pro is (or ZArchiver is) an advanced and comprehensive archive utility for Android devices. It supports creating archives (such as ZIP, 7z, tar, gzip, bzip2) and decompressing a wide variety of formats (ZIP, RAR, 7z, tar, iso, etc). You can view contents of archives before extraction, add/remove files from archives without full decompressing, create password-protected archives, handle multi-part archives and more. The interface is simple yet functional, optimized for mobile devices, and does not require internet access for its core features so your files stay local. It is ideal for users who manage many compressed files, backups, large media or want fine control over archives.
features: Create archives: ZIP, 7z, tar, bz2, gz, XZ, etc.
Extract/decompress archives including rar, rar5, zipx, mtz, iso, dmg, etc.
View archive contents without full extraction.
Edit archives: add or remove files, modify archives directly.
Password-protected archives; full unicode support for filenames (UTF-8, UTF-16).
Works fully offline; no internet permissions required for core functions.
Supports large files, multi-thread processing for performance.
androidApps.requirements:
Android 6.0 (Marshmallow) or later.

Minimal RAM required (lightweight app).

Sufficient free storage for archives and extractions.

No special hardware required beyond standard smartphone/tablet.

androidApps.name: SSVid
androidApps.shortDesc: SSVid APK is a simple and powerful video downloader and player that allows users to save and watch videos offline from various platforms quickly and easily.
androidApps.fullDesc: SSVid APK is an all-in-one tool designed for downloading, managing, and playing videos directly on your Android device. With an intuitive interface, it lets you copy and paste video links from popular social media or video sites and download them in multiple formats and resolutions. The built-in media player provides smooth playback, supports HD quality, and allows background play. It is lightweight, fast, and optimized for both smartphones and tablets, making it ideal for users who want to access their favorite videos anytime without an internet connection.
features: High-quality playback (up to HD and Full HD)
Built-in media player with background play
Fast download speed and lightweight design
Option to manage and organize downloaded videos
androidApps.requirements:
Android OS 6.0 or higher

Minimum 2 GB RAM

Stable internet connection for downloading videos

At least 100 MB of free storage space

androidApps.name: Remote Mouse
androidApps.shortDesc: Remote Mouse APK turns your smartphone or tablet into a wireless mouse, keyboard, and touchpad for your computer.
androidApps.fullDesc: Remote Mouse APK is an innovative app that allows users to control their computer remotely using their Android device. By connecting through Wi-Fi, it transforms your phone into a fully functional mouse and keyboard, making it perfect for presentations, media control, or casual browsing from a distance. The app provides smooth cursor movement, multi-touch gestures, and keyboard shortcuts for seamless operation. It also includes special panels for controlling media playback, PowerPoint slides, and more. With its intuitive interface and fast connection, Remote Mouse APK offers a convenient way to interact with your PC or Mac from anywhere within the same network.
features: Use your phone as a wireless mouse and keyboard
Support for multi-touch gestures and scrolling
Compatible with both Windows and Mac computers
androidApps.requirements:
Android OS 5.0 or higher

Wi-Fi connection shared with the target computer

Remote Mouse desktop software installed on the computer

Minimum 1 GB RAM on the device

androidApps.name: YouTube Gold
androidApps.shortDesc: YouTube Gold is an enhanced version of the official YouTube app that allows users to watch videos without ads, play content in the background, and easily download videos.
androidApps.fullDesc: YouTube Gold APK provides an advanced, ad-free viewing experience that combines the simplicity of the original YouTube app with powerful extra features. You can play videos in the background while using other apps, or download them in multiple qualities for offline viewing. It also features a sleek, responsive interface and full dark mode support.
features: Play videos in the background or with the screen off
Download videos in multiple quality options
Fast performance with low battery consumption
Supports sign-in with your personal account

Android 6.0 or higher

Stable internet connection

Sufficient storage space for installation

androidApps.name: MicroG Helper
androidApps.fullDesc: Essential helper app to run modified YouTube apps and enjoy all features
features: Enable login to Google account in modified apps
Manage multiple accounts and switch between them easily
Safe and private alternative to Google Play services

androidApps.fullDesc: Drama Live apk is an entertainment app that provides live TV and drama streaming services. It offers a wide range of TV channels and dramas from various countries. Users can watch their favorite shows and dramas on-the-go.

androidGames.name: Galaxy Attack: Alien Shooter
androidGames.shortDesc: Galaxy Attack: Alien Shooter is an action-packed space shooting game where you battle waves of alien invaders to save the galaxy.
androidGames.fullDesc: Galaxy Attack: Alien Shooter is one of the most popular arcade-style shooting games on Android. The game puts you in command of a lone spaceship, tasked with defending Earth and the galaxy from alien swarms. With each level, the difficulty increases as you face powerful bosses and intense bullet attacks. Players can upgrade their ships, unlock new weapons, and use power-ups to enhance their firepower. Featuring stunning graphics, smooth controls, and exciting gameplay, Galaxy Attack offers hours of non-stop action and classic arcade fun with a modern twist.
features: Boss battles with unique attack patterns
androidGames.requirements:
Android 6.0 or later

Minimum 2 GB RAM

200 MB free storage space

Works offline and online

androidGames.name: Worms Zone .io
androidGames.fullDesc: Worms Zone .io is a multiplayer online action game where players control a worm, eating food to grow and survive. The game features various power-ups, skins, and game modes. Players can compete with others to become the largest worm on the map.

androidGames.name: Toy Blast
androidGames.shortDesc: Toy Blast is a fun and colorful puzzle game where you match and blast cubes of the same color to complete exciting levels.
androidGames.fullDesc: Toy Blast takes you into a world full of toys and adventure. Join Amy and her toy friends as you pop cubes, use powerful boosters, and solve hundreds of challenging levels. The game offers simple yet addictive match-3 gameplay with stunning graphics and cheerful music. You can participate in daily and special events like Cube Party, Star Tournament, and Team Adventure, compete in the Legends Arena, and unlock new levels every two weeks. With fun challenges, vibrant visuals, and endless rewards, Toy Blast is perfect for players of all ages.
features: Special boosters and combos for extra fun
Join or create teams to play with friends
Legends Arena mode for top players
androidGames.requirements:
Android 6.0 or later

2 GB RAM or higher recommended

Internet connection for events and updates

Free to play with optional in-app purchases

androidGames.name: Candy Crush Saga
androidGames.shortDesc: Candy Crush Saga is a colorful and addictive match-3 puzzle game where you swap and match candies to complete hundreds of sweet levels.
androidGames.fullDesc: Candy Crush Saga takes you on a journey through a world of delicious candies and exciting puzzles. The goal is simple — match three or more candies of the same color to clear the board and reach the target score. As you progress, new challenges, boosters, and special candies are unlocked to help you complete harder levels. The game features various modes such as Jelly, Ingredients, and Order levels, each offering unique gameplay. With frequent updates, daily rewards, and limited-time events, Candy Crush Saga delivers endless fun and sweet satisfaction for players of all ages.
features: Thousands of fun and challenging levels
Boosters and special candies to clear tough stages
Daily rewards and special time-limited events
Play offline or connect online to sync progress
Free to play with optional in-app purchases
androidGames.requirements:
Android 6.0 or later

Minimum 2 GB RAM

Stable internet connection for events and updates

Sufficient free storage space

androidGames.name: Subway Surfers
androidGames.shortDesc: Subway Surfers is an endless running game where players dash through vibrant cityscapes, dodging trains, obstacles, and collecting coins while escaping from the grumpy inspector and his dog.
androidGames.fullDesc: Subway Surfers APK is one of the most popular endless runner games available for mobile devices. Developed by Kiloo and SYBO Games, it offers fast-paced gameplay filled with excitement and challenges. Players take on the role of Jake and his friends as they surf through the subways, avoiding trains, barriers, and tunnels while collecting coins, power-ups, and special rewards. The game features colorful graphics, smooth animations, and regular updates with new cities and adventures from around the world. With simple touch controls and dynamic gameplay, Subway Surfers provides endless fun and a highly addictive experience for players of all ages.
features: Endless running gameplay with increasing speed and challenge
Stunning HD graphics and vibrant world themes
Play as different characters with unique styles
Compete with friends and global players on leaderboards
Regular updates introducing new cities and events
androidGames.requirements:
Android 5.0 or higher

At least 2 GB RAM

300 MB of free storage space

Stable internet connection (for updates and leaderboards)
